wikipedia_page.main: Dylan Williams (born 14 October 1997) is an English footballer who plays for Southern League Premier Division Central side St Ives Town, where he plays as a midfielder.

response: Many of her books have been re-published by Gymdeithas Lyfrau Ceredigion. Many new books are based on her characters, for example: Sali Mali a'r Ceffyl Gwyllt, Dylan Williams, 2006. Various children's television programmes and merchandise connected to her characters have also been produced by S4C. The original illustrations in her books were the work of Rowena Wyn Jones and later, Jac Jones.
* 2005 – Children's Bestseller, Jac y Jwc ar y Fferm, Dylan Williams and Gordon Jones
